SEARCH
Package projeto_ed.Graphs

Class Graph<T>

java.lang.Object
projeto_ed.Graphs.Graph<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the vertices of the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Network
public class Graph<T> extends Object implements GraphADT<T>
Graph represents an adjacency matrix implementation of a graph.
